item.title: Memory issue with ImageMagick
item.description: Today, I was combining a set of images like so: 1 $ convert -append figP*.png out.png when I got error stating that cache resources exhausted. I was first surprised because it was the same set of images I combined a couple of days before EXCEPT that I significantly increased their resolution. So I googled the error message and found this issue on the GitHub repository of ImageMagick.
